mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (username, password, mobile, email, avatar, credit_score, status, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{mobile}, #{email}, #{avatar}, #{creditScore}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
